      • load

        public <T> T load(File f,
                  JSONUtils.ReferenceSupplier<T> ref)
           throws IOException
        Loads JSON from a file and ensures it's located in the specified class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameter of the class
        Parameters:
        f - The file to read from
        ref - A JSONUtils.ReferenceSupplier for the class to be loaded into.
        Returns:
        The JSON loaded into the provided class
        Throws:
        IOException - If there's an issue loading the JSON

        Converts an object to a JSON string. Can be a pretty string
        Parameters:
